folders-list.description: Returns all the folders within the source

parameters.name: parentFolderID
parameters.description: The ID of the folder for which to retrieve the subfolders; optional, defaults to root(0)

folder-get.description: Retrieves a folder (subfolders are not populated)

uriParameters.name: folderID
uriParameters.description: The id of the folder to retrieve

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the folder to add

parameters.name: parentFolderID
parameters.description: The ID of the folder under which to add the new subfolder

uriParameters.name: folderID
uriParameters.description: The id of the folder to delete

folder-move.description: Moves a folder to a new subfolder and/or position within the parent folder

uriParameters.name: folderID
uriParameters.description: The id of the folder to move

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: The new sort order of the folder (the position within the new parent folder)

parameters.name: parentFolderID
parameters.description: The (new) folder parent to put the folder in

folder-markasread.description: Marks all posts in the folder as read, returns the affected feedIDs

uriParameters.name: folderID
uriParameters.description: The id of the folder to mark as read
